com.teamdev.jxbrowser.chromium

Class MediaStreamDeviceRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.teamdev.jxbrowser.chromium.MediaStreamDeviceRequest

  • public final class MediaStreamDeviceRequest
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a request for media streams (audio/video).
    表示对媒体流（音频/视频）的请求。

    • Method Summary

      All Methods  Instance Methods  Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MediaStreamDevice getDefaultMediaStreamDevice()
      Returns default media stream device of the requested type or null when there's no media stream devices available.
      返回所请求类型的默认媒体流设备；如果没有可用的媒体流设备，则返回null。
      java.util.List<MediaStreamDevice> getMediaStreamDevices()
      Returns a list of available media stream devices of the requested type.
      返回所请求类型的可用媒体流设备的列表。
      MediaStreamType getMediaStreamType()
      Returns type of the requested media stream.
      返回请求的媒体流的类型。
      void setDefaultMediaStreamDevice(MediaStreamDevice device)
      Updates default media stream device of the requested type.
      更新请求类型的默认媒体流设备。

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getMediaStreamType

        public MediaStreamType getMediaStreamType()
        Returns type of the requested media stream.
        返回请求的媒体流的类型。
        Returns:
        type of the requested media stream. 请求的媒体流的类型。

      • getMediaStreamDevices

        public java.util.List<MediaStreamDevice> getMediaStreamDevices()
        Returns a list of available media stream devices of the requested type.
        返回所请求类型的可用媒体流设备的列表。
        Returns:
        a list of available media stream devices of the requested type or empty collection if there's no media streams devices available. 所请求类型的可用媒体流设备的列表；如果没有可用的媒体流设备，则为空集合。

      • getDefaultMediaStreamDevice

        public MediaStreamDevice getDefaultMediaStreamDevice()
        Returns default media stream device of the requested type or null when there's no media stream devices available.
        返回所请求类型的默认媒体流设备；如果没有可用的媒体流设备，则返回null。
        Returns:
        default media stream device of the requested type or null when there's no media stream devices available. 请求类型的默认媒体流设备或没有可用的媒体流设备时。

      • setDefaultMediaStreamDevice

        public void setDefaultMediaStreamDevice(MediaStreamDevice device)
        Updates default media stream device of the requested type. The device value must be the one from the list of available media stream devices you can obtain via the getMediaStreamDevices() method.
        更新请求类型的默认媒体流设备。设备值必须是可以通过getMediaStreamDevices（）方法获取的可用媒体流设备列表中的值。
        Parameters:
        device - default media stream device. Cannot be null. It must be the one from the list of available media stream devices you can obtain via the getMediaStreamDevices() method. -默认媒体流设备。不可能是 。它必须是可以通过该方法获取的可用媒体流设备列表中的一个。
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when device is null, or its media type doesn't match the requested media type that can be obtained via the getMediaStreamType() method, or the device isn't in the list of available devices.
